'''Ólama''' means "consonant" in [[Quenya]].
==Etymology==
The word seems to derive from the [[PQ]] [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[LAM]] (q.v.)
==Examples==
*''erólamaite'' "monoconsonantal"
*''attólamaite'' "biconsonantal"
*''nelólamaite'' "triconsonantal"
